mapper.select: /* UserMapper.selectOtpTopOne */ SELECT SEQ, USER_ID, AUTH_FG, AUTH_NO, RECV_MP_NO, REQ_IP, REQ_DATE, REQ_DT FROM ( SELECT SEQ, USER_ID, AUTH_FG, AUTH_NO, RECV_MP_NO, REQ_IP, REQ_DATE, REQ_DT FROM TB_WB_OTP_AUTH_HIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND AUTH_FG = #{authFg} ORDER BY REQ_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
/* UserMapper.selectOtpCheck */ SELECT SEQ, USER_ID, AUTH_FG, AUTH_NO, RECV_MP_NO, REQ_IP, REQ_DATE, REQ_DT FROM TB_WB_OTP_AUTH_HIST WHERE SEQ = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: /* UserMapper.insertOtpAuth */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_OTP_AUTH_HIST ( SEQ, USER_ID, AUTH_FG, AUTH_NO, RECV_MP_NO, REQ_IP, REQ_DATE, REQ_DT ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{userId}, #{authFg}, #{authNo}, #{recvMpNo}, #{reqIp}, #{reqDate}, #{reqDt} )

/* UserMapper.insertPwdChgHist */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_PWD_CHG_HIST ( USER_ID, IDX, PRIOR_PWD, REG_IP, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX),0) + 1 AS MAX FROM TB_WB_PWD_CHG_HIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), #{priorPwd}, #{regIp}, #{regDt}, #{regId} )
